issue.title: form.jotform.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://form.jotform.com/252097974931166](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fform.jotform.com%2F252097974931166) ### Comment > After displaying normally for about a month a jotform stopped displaying any background images or colors. The urls www.jotform.com, pci.jotform.com, and *jotform.com are added to the whitelist, to no apparent effect. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/iwfk1f45c7k8c8ww8sg04w88cos8g8kdvzhohzg4bw.png?nc=1)

issue.title: bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.66.4 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.bilibili.com/ ### Ad Blocking EasyList ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. When I disable the subscription 'AdGuard Chinese (中文)', the problem goes away. 2. There are two issue. see the screenshots. 3. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: This screenshot URL was copied from a comment in the subscription rules, and the problem is exactly the same. https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3976203/273172163-25ff30a0-c988-4ec3-9e51-cf4722a90976.jpg
Screenshot 2: After these video card placeholders are loaded, some of them get inserted in front of already loaded video cards instead of being appended at the end, which messes up the order.
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition
